subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong, the seven-time Tour de France winner, said on Tuesday that he was 100 percent sure to return to the Tour in 2010, riding for a team with a new sponsor.
snippet: Lance Armstrong, the seven-time Tour de France winner, said on Tuesday that he was 100 percent sure to return to the Tour in 2010, riding for a team with a new sponsor.
